name: Mask Of Reality
description:
This game was made for the mini Jam 113

Mask of reality is a turn-based game where you play as an adventurer (Mage, Rogue, Warrior) who reached the end of the journey and is about to fight the final boss on his road!

Controls:
Movement: WASD/Arrows
Mouse

A lot of ideas were scrapped while making this game because of the time limit, but if you enjoyed it I will try to add everything and update the game! So don't forget to comment if you enjoyed it!

Game by Cursed soul
Art by Aly
Music by: https://youtube.com/watch?v=5bn3Jmvep1k&feature=share
